frame.name: Attitude_description
frame.definition:
<def-root>The lexical units in this frame are descriptions of a <fen>Cognizer</fen>'s <fen>Attitude</fen> about or outlook on a <fen>State_of_affairs</fen>.
<ex></ex> <ex><fex name="Cog">Carl</fex> is becoming <fex name="Deg">more</fex> <t>pessimistic</t> <fex name="State">about the negotiations</fex> every day.</ex>
<ex>The benefits of cluelessness come from living in a society where <fex name="Cog">people</fex> <m>take</m> an <t>optimistic</t> <fex name="Att">view</fex> <fex name="State">of life</fex>.</ex> <ex></ex> The <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> can be expressed without a <fen>Cognizer</fen> in many cases, as shown in the following: <ex></ex> <ex><fex name="State">The situation</fex> is <fex name="Deg">fairly</fex> <t>grim</t> at the moment.</ex> <ex></ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Cognizer
FE.definition:
<def-root>The person whose <fen>Attitude</fen> about a <fen>State_of_affairs</fen> is being expressed.
<ex><fex name="Cog">Americans</fex> are <t>optimistic</t> despite the climbing unemployment rate.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Attitude
FE.definition:
<def-root>The outlook or viewpoint expressed by the <fen>Cognizer</fen>.
<ex>Michelle had a somewhat <t>negative</t> <fex name="Attitude">outlook</fex> on the direction her life was heading.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: State_of_affairs
FE.definition:
<def-root>An event, topic, or situation about which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has an <fen>Attitude</fen>.
<ex><fex name="State">The economy</fex> <m>looks</m> quite <t>grim</t> at this moment.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>The degree of the <fen>Attitude</fen> description.
<ex>The team was <fex name="Deg">very</fex> <t>hopeful</t> about the prospective victory. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The Time interval during which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has the <fen>Attitude</fen> about the <fen>State_of_affairs</fen>.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: hopeful.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having an optimistic outlook; being full of hope

lexUnit.name: hopeless.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having a pessimistic outloock; lacking hope

lexUnit.name: dark.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having a depressed or gloomy attitude
